mapper.insert: insert into position(position_no, position_name, step) values(position_seq.nextval, #{position_name}, #{step})
insert into set_pay(set_date, position_no, basic_pay) values (#{set_date}, #{position_no}, #{basic_pay})
insert into set_add_pay(set_date, position_no, add_pay) values (#{set_date}, #{position_no}, #{add_pay})
mapper.update: update position set step = #{step} where position_no = #{position_name}
mapper.select: select p.position_no, p.position_name, p.step, s.basic_pay, s.set_date,a.add_pay from position p join set_pay s on p.position_no = s.position_no join set_add_pay a on p.position_no=a.position_no order by step
select emp_no from emp where position_no=#{position_no}
